modules.description: Tracks numeric values, counters, and timing data from specified sources, using tagged identifiers for fine-grained control. Operates on mutable state structures and closures to minimize overhead when disabled. Enables real-time performance tracking in production environments, with separate reporting mechanisms for data output.

Tracks metric data through asynchronous operations, capturing timestamps, results, and exceptions. It works with Lwt threads and metrics sources, recording data points and periodic statistics. Used to monitor performance and error rates in concurrent applications.
